mainText:
We will all miss Steve Jobs.  He served as an inspiration to me so that when
I grow up I would like to be a businessman.  As an Apple Fanboy (what my
friends call me), I am most grieved by Steve Jobs's death and I thought it
was really sad that he maybe didn't get to experience the new iphone 4s.
 Apple was really a great company and now is and always will be my most
favorite company in the world and Steve Jobs will always serve as an
inspiration to me and I will never forget him.
author: Anish
